price: O, kendisinden başka (hak) ilah olmayan Allah’tır. Gaybı ve görüleni bilendir. O, çok bağışlayıcıdır, çok merhametlidir.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
